title: Worlds Apart: An Anthology of Lesbian and Gay Science Fiction and Fantasy
description: Cover art by George Barr. Edited and introduced by Camilla Decarnin, Eric Garber, and Lyn Paleo.Harper Conan and Singer David by Edgar PangbornHouston, Houston, Do You Read? by James Tiptree, Jr.To Keep the Oath by Marion Zimmer BradleyDo Androids Dream of Electric Love? by Walt LiebscherLollipop and the Tar Baby by John VarleyThe Mystery of the Young Gentleman by Joanna RussThe Gods of Reorth by Elizabeth A. LynnFind the Lady by Nicholas FiskNo Day Too Long by Jewelle GomezFull Fathom Five My Father Lies by Rand B. LeeTime Considered as a Helix of Semi-Precious Stones by Samuel R. Delany
author: Camilla Decarnin
